xmpp.EntityTime

type
class
available in
flash, js, neko, php
XEP 202 - EntityTime

Static Variables

XMLNS : String

Static Methods

parse(x : Xml) : EntityTime

Constructor

new(?utc : String, ?tzo : String)

Instance Variables

tzo : String

The entity's numeric time zone offset from UTC. The format conforms to the Time Zone Definition (TZD) specified in XEP-0082 (http://www.xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0082.html).

utc : String

The UTC time according to the responding entity. The format conforms to the dateTime profile specified in XEP-0082 (http://www.xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0082.html) and MUST be expressed in UTC.

Instance Methods

toXml() : Xml
